    ! Backward pass

        if (s(i) == 'A') then

program main

    implicit none

    integer :: n, i

    integer(8), allocatable :: a(:)

    read(*,*) (a(i), i=1,n)

        end if

        if (s(i) == 'A') then

        else

    ! Backward pass

    do i =n,1,-1

        if (s(i) == 'A') then

        else

    ! Now, second program's input is ans (x)

    ! Compute next prime

        candidate = x +1

    else

    end if

        sqrt_candidate = nint(sqrt(real(candidate)))

        is_prime =1

        do i=3, sqrt_candidate, 2

            if (mod(candidate, i) ==0) then

                is_prime =0

                exit

            end if

        end do

        if (is_prime ==1) then

            exit

        else

            candidate = candidate +2

        end if

    end do

    ! Now, third program's input is candidate (prime)

    ! Process third program

    print *, n, ' '

    m =n

    do i =n-1,1,-1

        if (mod(m, i) ==0) then

            print *, i, ' '

            m =i

        end if

    end do

end program main

program main

    implicit none

    integer :: n, i, j, k

    integer(8), allocatable :: a(:)

    character(len=1), allocatable :: s(:)

    integer(8) :: sum, ans, sum1, x, candidate, m

    integer :: sqrt_candidate, is_prime

    ! Read first program's input

    read(*,*) n

    allocate(a(n), s(n))

    read(*,*) (a(i), i=1,n)

    character(len=n) :: s_str

    read(*, '(a)') s_str

    do i=1,n

        s(i) = s_str(i:i)

    end do

    ! Process first program

    sum =0

    do i=1,n

        if (s(i) == 'B') then

            sum = sum + a(i)

        end if

    end do

    ans = sum

    sum1 = sum

    ! First forward pass

    do i=1,n

        if (s(i) == 'A') then

            sum1 = sum1 + a(i)

        else

            sum1 = sum1 - a(i)

        end if

        if (sum1 > ans) ans = sum1

    end do

    ! Backward pass

    sum1 = sum

    do i =n,1,-1

        if (s(i) == 'A') then

            sum1 = sum1 + a(i)

        else

            sum1 = sum1 - a(i)

        end if

        if (sum1 > ans) ans = sum1

    end do

    ! Now, second program's input is ans (x)

    x = ans

    ! Compute next prime

    if (mod(x,2) ==0 .and. x /=2) then

        candidate = x +1

    else

        candidate = x

    end if

    do while (true)

        sqrt_candidate = nint(sqrt(real(candidate)))

        is_prime =1

        do j=3, sqrt_candidate, 2

            if (mod(candidate, j) ==0) then

                is_prime =0

                exit

            end if

        end do

        if (is_prime ==1) then

            exit

        else

            candidate = candidate +2

        end if

    end do

    ! Now, third program's input is candidate (prime)

    n = candidate

    ! Process third program

    print *, n, ' '

    m =n

    do k =n-1,1,-1

        if (mod(m, k) ==0) then

            print *, k, ' '

            m =k

        end if

    end do

end program main
